channel.title: Remake of Allstar
channel.description:
[size=18pt][font=arial]Intro:[/font][/size]
Hey guys this is my attempt to make allstar something special and better and more efficient. I have never worked on any particular development like this before since ive only worked with pi. The things i want to fix on allstar is clean up every file and make it run more smoothly + i want to add a better combat system. I also will be thankful for the help i will get. Im sure many of you think all this wont work maybe cuz of my rep but its a long time since i posted before since i took a break and read abit about JAVA. Hopefully you will support me on this. Also i wont post on this thread everyday every day as i dont have too much time to spend on it because of job and shcool.
[font=arial][size=18pt]Media:[/size][/font]
Whats done?
red indicates not started orange indicates started green indicates finished
[size=14pt][font=courier]~List of stuff~[/font][/size] Moving all the CFG files into a config map Make combat better Move home to lumbridge Remove all custom voids thats dead and is not working Remove most of the dead code Clean up the source general for un-needed files and sort out the ones we need. make all the commands we need work Make a new teleport system wich is alot better then whats on it now Adding same delay system as delta! Clean up the thread system Tutorial island 2 connections per ip make all the commands we need work Remove most of the dead code make a new stairs method make a new door method
More to come
[font=courier][size=14pt]~Skills~[/size][/font] Fishing attack strength deffence ranged prayer magic runecrafting herblore thieving woodcutting smithing mining fishing cooking agility firemaking farming crafting fletching slayer
Pictures: //All emotes works except rabit hop wich isnt in the cache. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/849/emotes.jpg/][IMG]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/2898/emotes.jpg[/img][/URL]
[size=18pt][font=arial]Developers:[/font][/size] Arve - Me
[size=18pt][font=arial]Credits:[/font][/size] Mod demolish for the base Tharaok for the compiler

item.title: Remake of Allstar
item.dc:creator: @arve arve
item.description:
@arve wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:24, topic:413715”][quote author=F A I L S link=topic=515677.msg3744416#msg3744416 date=1315628633]

[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2u9tlaq.jpg[img]

Everyone has the right to be inspired. At least they are doing something constructive.
[/quote]Exactly what i’m saying, No one thinks before they post a pointless post on a thread, he did the same thing on mine. He’s saying everyone’s copying off everyone for doing this. Well guess what everyone has a PI, is everyone copying off each other? Also he need’s to take into consideration, maybe iv’e had the source i’m coding on my desktop for 1-2 months, and i want to finish what i started. People are so Dumb.

He’s not dumb… He’s just simply stating that there are too many remakes.[/quote]

I surley do agree, no need for fights or anything so let the thread go on now

Read full topic

item.description:
@arve wrote:

[size=18pt][font=arial]Intro:[/font][/size]

Hey guys this is my attempt to make allstar something special and better and more efficient. I have never worked on any particular development like this before since ive only worked with pi. The things i want to fix on allstar is clean up every file and make it run more smoothly + i want to add a better combat system. I also will be thankful for the help i will get. Im sure many of you think all this wont work maybe cuz of my rep but its a long time since i posted before since i took a break and read abit about JAVA. Hopefully you will support me on this. Also i wont post on this thread everyday every day as i dont have too much time to spend on it because of job and shcool.

[font=arial][size=18pt]Media:[/size][/font]

Whats done?

red indicates not started
orange indicates started
green indicates finished

[size=14pt][font=courier]~List of stuff~[/font][/size]
Moving all the CFG files into a config map
Make combat better
Move home to lumbridge
Remove all custom voids thats dead and is not working
Remove most of the dead code
Clean up the source general for un-needed files and sort out the ones we need.
make all the commands we need work
Make a new teleport system wich is alot better then whats on it now
Adding same delay system as delta!
Clean up the thread system
Tutorial island
2 connections per ip
make all the commands we need work
Remove most of the dead code
make a new stairs method
make a new door method

More to come
